LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsDesc: Select which main buttons stay on the bottom bar.
LanguageData.DMMB.AdvancedEditModeDesc: In this mode, you can resize buttons and add dropdown menus to each button.
LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsFixedWidthCenter: Center fixed-width buttons when there is extra space
LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsPinMenuRight: Pin vanilla menu button to the right
LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsPlaySettingsHoverToggle: Reveal play settings on hover (hides the menu button)
LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsPlaySettingsHoverToggleDesc: Shows play settings only while your mouse is over the bottom-right UI widgets (date, time, speed, etc.).
LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsGizmoScaleMapOnlyDesc: These controls only scale map gizmos which are rendered when you select either a colonist/building on the map.
LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsMenuBlacklistDesc: Select which main buttons appear in the menu list.
LanguageData.DMMB.SettingsMenuBlacklistUseHidden: Show only disabled buttons in the menu
LanguageData.DMMB.PlaySettingsEditDropdowns: Edit main buttons (move, resize, and set dropdowns)
LanguageData.DMMB.DropdownEditorDesc: Select which buttons should appear when you hover a main button.
